___balancingCharge.description: If an item for which capital allowance was claimed has been sold, given away or is no longer in use
___balancingCharge.title: Balancing charge

___lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years set off against this year’s profits
___lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward

___privateUseAdjustment.description: Any expenses incurred not solely for the property business
___privateUseAdjustment.title: Private use adjustment
